Changelog
=========


0.2.1 (2011-04-05)
------------------

- added full path output after update call


0.2 (2011-04-03)
----------------

- added -d option to add explicit domain name
- refactored commands
- pep8 cleanups


0.1 (2010-11-13)
----------------

- Initial release with commands: create, update, find, mo
